Package gui

Class ProductFrame

java.lang.Object
dataAccessLayer.connection.ConnectionFactory
gui.ProductFrame
public class ProductFrame extends ConnectionFactory
Represents a GUI frame for managing products data.

Provides functionality for adding, editing, deleting, and displaying products.

  • Method Details

    • chooseOperation

      public void chooseOperation(boolean showInputs, boolean addProductOk, boolean editProductOk, boolean deleteProductOk, boolean showProductsOk)
      Displays the appropriate input fields (and corresponding labels) and buttons based on the selected operation.
      Parameters:
      showInputs - true if the input fields should be visible, false otherwise
      addProductOk - true if the addProduct button should be visible, false otherwise
      editProductOk - true if the editProduct button should be visible, false otherwise
      deleteProductOk - true if the deleteProduct button should be visible, false otherwise
      showProductsOk - true if the products table should be visible, false otherwise

    • mainButtons

      public void mainButtons()
      Initializes the main buttons of the frame and sets their properties.

    • initFields

      public void initFields()
      Initializes the input fields and labels for adding, editing, deleting, and displaying products.

    • contPanel

      public void contPanel()
      Creates the main/container panel for the client frame and adds it to the frame.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The entry point of the program.
      Parameters:
      args - the command line arguments
